text: @WhiteHouse @DHSgov There are about 11 million illegal immigrants in the U.S., and they've been here an average of 16 years.  If this is a top 10 issue for someone, they need to take a hard look in the mirror.  Regarding coronavirus, the dummies that refuse to wear masks are the real risk.
